message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me. How about we settle at $17,000?

I understand you think the product is worth more to you, but I'm still not convinced I should pay $17,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $17,000, so I'll offer $14,500. Can we do business at that price?
